Having my nose pierced 20yrs ago hurt worse..much worse than this faith piercing. It was just alot of pressure and honestly...i was halfway home before I started feeling any pain. Ppl warned me about sleeping on the same side, but I did anyways and it still doesn't hurt to sleep on that same side. I'm so very impressed and will def go back if i need the other side done!!!

name: Britt Corley
text:
I am leaving a 1-star review, not based on the artwork I’ve gotten (it is amazing), but based on my overall experience, which has been highly lacking. For what I have paid, I expect professionalism in ALL aspects. I’m not complaining at all about the artwork, because it is amazing, but I have found fault with the other aspects of how this business is run.

TWICE now I’ve arrived at the shop before my appointment time and have waited at least 40 minutes to 1 hour after my appointment was scheduled only to not have the artist show up. Both times I received no contact from the artist  beforehand either apologizing for having to reschedule, calling or messaging me to reschedule or just to tell me that, for some reason or another, he can’t make it. The first time I had to contact them myself. This time, I decided to wait and see how long it would take him or the shop to contact me and now, hours later, I’ve still received no contact from them of any type. This is, in my opinion, EXTREMELY UNPROFESSIONAL. Once is an accident. Twice is not and there will not be a third time.

I was fully prepared to continue using Ink’d Up as the place to go to whenever I decided on more tattoos in the future, as their artwork is on point, however the blatant lack of professionalism and lack of respect for their clients has put me off. Unlike some, I do have other things to do during the days and cannot wait around all day at a tattoo parlor. I will not be a client there again. I would rather pay another shop to finish my tattoo and for any touch-ups needed in the future.

When determining what tattoo shop to visit for your tattoo, please remember tattoos are mostly permanent. Choose wisely.

Update: I got a piercing done today and they were so patient and all around amazing! I seriously can not recommend them enough!

I haven't gotten any work done here yet, but I stopped by to ask some questions and they were super nice and helpful! I was nervous about going it without knowing very much at all, but the people who work here are super patient and friendly. I'll definitely be coming here when the time comes!

name: Kristopher Walter
text: I have now been here for nipple piercings and have got 2 tattoos. They do amazing work (great price) and super friendly. I would highly recommend!

name: Ashley Perez-Mondragon
text: I got my cartilage pierced here! Emi was super nice and gave me advice about my piercing. I will definitely be back for more piercings!

resp.text: We were happy to hear that you had such a great experience and can’t wait to see you in your next visit

name: Rachel Barnett
text: I got my nipples pierced Tuesday. She was the best piercer I have ever had. She was thorough, explained everything, and was super fast, friendly, and gentle. I told her I was very nervous, and she helped calm my nerves by walking me through the process and talking me through the whole thing. Thanks girl! I didn’t catch your name, but You rock!!

name: George Cantrell (Mountain Cabin Music)
text: Kortni was amazing and made the whole experience very enjoyable. I will definitely be returning for more work in the future.

resp.text: Thanks George we appreciate your business

name: Beth Hampton
text: This was my first tattoo, and Rene was AMAZING!!!!!!!! I will definitely be back for more ink!!!! The owner, John is a friend of a friend, and is awesome as well!!!! I highly recommend Dodge City Tattoo for all your ink needs!!!!!!

name: Jayme Jenkins
text: Awesome costumer service an a great  Atmosphere! I love my ear piercing I would highly recommend them to people!!

name: Sam Quinney
text: Got my nose done today! Fast, friendly service and a reasonable price.

name: Savahanna Robinson
text: John did these and the I love you is in my moms handwriting and the other is the start of my sleeve! I could not have asked for anyone better to do these! I am in love with them and everyone at the shop is laid back and great customer service too! I would give them 1,000 stars if I could!!

resp.text: Thank you so much. Can’t wait for your next visit

name: Karli Madison
text: I came in the other day and Lance gave me 4 piercings, he’s good at making you feel comfortable about it and he pierces very fast and smoothly. I also got a script tat on my arm by René and she did very good, she has really good line work and definitely knows what she’s doing. The staff is super friendly and has great prices. If I need anything else done I’m definitely come back here.

name: C M Hughes
text:
Super friendly
Explained process throughly

name: zoe karaminas
text: Lisa performed a piercing on me and out of the multiple I’ve had, she was by far the best at going out of her way to make you comfortable and make your experience great! The shop was so clean and I felt very welcomed! Most tattoo places I have been too have been very intimidating with rude employees but Dodge City Tattoo one definitely raises the bar for everywhere else! I spoke with John about a tattoo covering and he showed me his beautiful flawless work. I have three “homes” in different states and I will be coming to them for every piercing and tattoo itch I get.

name: Noone Youknow
text: Very friendly and helpful definitely making a return visit

name: Billy Bruer
text: Rene done great job I strongly recommend useing her for your next tattoo

name: Michelle Herrick
text: Amazing staff. Answered all of my questions. super friendly. explained the whole process before and while peircing/tattooing

name: Jon Hammonds
text: Had eyebrow pierced they did a awesome job very professional.

name: Elizabeth Cobb
text: Great place!  They worked with me to find a time to get me in and did a great job.  Everyone was super nice.  Kortni was great to work with, she made sure I wasn't rushed and was completely happy with the tattoo.  I highly recommend this shop.  I drove over an hour to get here and will continue to do so for any other pieces I get done.

name: Brittney Anderson
text: I've had a tattoo done by Kortni, and I absolutely love it.. I've also had John rework an outline I got from a different shop. Let me tell you, he had his work cut out for him. And he worked his magic. I never thought I'd be proud of that tattoo on my shoulder, but after he finished it, I was blown away. I'm so happy with how it came out. This shop is full of great artists who really go the extra mile to make your experience a good one.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words. We hope you have a safe trip back home

name: jason hunt
text: Rene is a great artist and person! I highly recommend her.

name: Brandon Otwell
text: Rene was very professional and made me feel very comfortable for my first tattoo! I will definitely come here for future tattoos!

name: Angel Negrete
text: Nice people too pricey.  Clean shop, awful parking.

resp.text: Thanks for the review Angel.  We appreciate the feedback.

name: Sharon Underwood
text: GREAT FOLKS & love my tattoo!!! I had an idea of what I wanted and they helped me figure it out.

resp.text: Glad we could help out. Come back anytime.

name: Ashley Wright
text:
I have had the eminence please of being officially all work by the talented artist here at Dodge City Tattoo Company establishment. Cleaniest place by far Ive been in. I have 2 beautiful pieces by each of thier artist so far. John and Kortni are out of this world and VERY experienced. Also Misty is a wiz at getting you the perfect pircing and offering high quality jewelry! If you havent already been here you are missing out!
But hey if you do end up going elsewhere and completely regret it they do out of this world cover ups! They also are one of the few who offer Griffin Salve and IT IS THE HOLY GRAIL! You want it to be apart of your healing process!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words and support. We enjoy your visits every time

name: jamie stewart
text: Great vibe cool people amazing art it's all you can ask for 🔥

name: Penny Johnson
text: My experience today was awesome!! I got a nose & Tragus Piercing and Lance was sooo friendly and professional! I definitely recommend him and Dodge City Tattoo...I will be going back for an old tattoo re-do!

name: Jared Wright
text: Amazing atmosphere you always fill welcomed when you walk in the door. Very professional staff and very clean facially. The artist's work speeks for itself!!!

name: Rachel Wright
text: I haven’t had great experiences in the past with tattoo shops; my first tattoo which held great meaning to me basically got made fun of by the artist. So needless to say I didn’t have very high expectations of coming here, but let me tell you, it was a wonderful experience and I plan on going back for ANY tattoos I want. Everyone was so friendly and professional and everything was clean, not to mention the atmosphere was so laid back and they were immediately cutting up with you like they’ve known you forever. My tattoo from the gumball machine turned out fantastic, the process was smooth, the price was very reasonable, and I was taken care of. This shop is wonderful and I sincerely hope they grow and prosper!

name: MJ Partain
text: The piercer is very nice, and she makes sure that you know how to take care of your new piercings properly. Everything is brand new so you know that it's never been used on anyone else. I watched her open the needles and everything. Very friendly service and 100% professional.

name: Jennifer Guthery
text: One of my favorite childhood books and Kortni did such a beautiful job on it! I love everything about the work done here. The atmosphere was great to boot.

resp.text: So glad you had a good experience

name: Leisa Nickles
text: They are very friendly and help you in any way possible.

name: Alexandra Liberatore
text: Kortni was amazing and we love our new tattoos! Couldn’t have asked for a better artists!!

name: Matt Shedd
text: Great staff, and awesome artist! Very clean and organized shop! Will be going back soon to get more ink!

name: Christine Long
text: Lisa was great, I'll be back!

name: Andrea Woodard
text: I absolutely love this place. The entire crew is so sweet, respectful, and professional. I have had tattoos done and now my nose. Thank you Lisa...you rock

resp.text: Thanks for all of your support !!!!

text:
John just finished up my shoulder piece and it looks amazing! Better than what I had envisioned! Great people and great artists.

PS... you wouldn't bring your lizard to your dentist appointment, why would you think it could go in a tattoo shop? Lizards and Hawks and tattoos! Crazy day!

resp.text: Thank you !!!!  Hope you come back when it’s not so hectic 😂

name: Anna Smith
text: I came here for my first tattoo, and everything was wonderful! Everyone was friendly and polite, and the artist was very informative and helpful!

text: I got both ears pierced by Lisa today (two low slugs and an industrial) and she was really awesome! Very friendly, clean, and professional. I will definitely by going back to her when I get any other piercing!

text: I love this shop. The atmosphere is clean and great, and the artist do amazing work. I don't mind driving almost a hour just to get tattooed by John. They have the best customer service. Anyone who says anything different was surely asking for something illegal or unreasonable and just didn't get his or her way. Best shop in Alabama.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the support ....

text: the girl at the counter Renee is very horrible and unpleasant. When I got a tattoo there's ink missing in spots. As they tried to rush to get my tattoo done very unprofessional not please never will go back

resp.text: We’re sorry you had this experience at our shop. Please call tuesday and ask to speak with the owner. He takes customer service and quality very serious and will make sure that the issue is rectified.

name: Kayla Whitney
text: Best tattoo shop in the area! The entire place has amazing energy and very talented artists! 10/10 would recommend!

name: Charlotte Halcomb
text: I got dermal dimples (try saying that ten times fast) I know you are lol. Anyways they were awesome I had scar tissue which made it more difficult for them but they handled it like pros. Even gave me a discount.

resp.text: Thank you Charlotte. We appreciate your support

name: Amber Chavez
text: Hands down the best tattoo shop I've been to in awhile. I love how everyone is really awesome and down to earth they make you feel at home. I would recommend this place to everyone who asks me about a tattoo shop. Dodge city tattoo is where it's at and will definitely be the only shop I'll go to. Keep up the amazing work y'all.

name: Paul Dillard
text: Had matching tattoos done on my wife and daughter here today. Place is amazing. John and staff are the best at what they do. We have been looking for a new tattoo place for almost 2 years since we moved here. Guess what? We found it. From the first time I spoke with him I knew this was gonna be our new spot. They use only the best equipment and supplies. Dodge City Tattoo is a top notch operation and the only place in the area that I will go for tattoos as long as I live in Alabama!

resp.text: Thank you for coming in. We look forward to your next visit !

We got quoted a price in Birmingham that was double what we payed here at Dodge city and their work was top notch! I will 100% be back.

I have already started planning my next piece with Megan and cannot wait to get back in the chair!

Thank you

Awesome staff and quality work! Highly recommend!

We will definitely be back and would recommend if you're in the area to get your tattoos done here!

Everyone that works there is so friendly and makes it an absolutely incredible experience! I had a long 4-5 hours session and it flew by. So thankful to have found such a talented artist and wonderful studio!

name: Ewellin maria
text:
Great music and even better tattoo artists! Everyone in the shop was extremely nice, I had a very great experience there, the shop environment was chill and I got exactly what I wanted, they did some awesome work for me.

10/10 would recommend coming here.

name: Anna Moore
text: My sisters and I got matching tattoos while we were on our Mother/Daughter trip. Maddie provided the service and was very professional and quick . They were very busy but once she started we were in and out within 45mins. Highly Recommend !!!

name: Saire Barnhill
text: I drove almost 2 hrs to have my tattoo done here and I'm so glad I found them. This will be the only shop I go to from now on. I looked for a shop from  Panama City beach all the way to mobile Alabama and this is the one that stood out. You will not be disappointed with any of these amazing artists.

name: Brooke P
text: Empire is an amazing tattoo shop. Super professional and Carol did an outstanding job on my tattoo! Front desk girls are super sweet and helpful. Definitely will be recommending them to others!

name: Ashley Franklin
text: Carol did so amazing on my tattoo! Not only was the customer service amazing but the atmosphere was amazing as well. These artist are at the top. I’ve never seen such great line work. I’m obsessed.

name: Amanda Faulkner
text:
I’ve had two tattoos done by Maddie.  She is courteous and knows what she’s doing as well as talented and patient.
The front desk staff is professional and super helpful. It’s a comfortable atmosphere. The work that comes out of this shop is top notch.

name: Bagasso
text:
I wouldn’t go anywhere else! Hands down one of the best studios in the country, I love this place.

Artists are all on another level incredibly patient, professional and talented. And the shop atmosphere is just awesome!

name: Amber Bryce
text: This is the second time I’ve brought my daughters here for facial piercings. Extremely clean studio, really kind folks, very professional. Highly recommend. I’ve also gotten a tattoo here {artist Madi} and am very happy with it!

name: Miss Brooke
text:
Where do I start...
Let’s just say this establishment will sadly allow anyone with the ability to sign their name come in and have work done. They do cheap piercings. They do not ID. Someone took my debit card from me and was able to use it at this establishment. When I reached out to the owner, all she did was make excuses instead of apologizing for their lack of professionalism and accountability was out the window. I had to ask her more than once to stop contacting me, as she was uninterested in a resolution that included anything other than blame shifting. Finally I had to text, making it clear that I had it in writing that I wanted no further contact from her. I started not to write this review, but I changed my mind just because if you are truly looking for a permanent change to your body-such as a piercing or a tattoo- you need to find somewhere to go where integrity is number one. I can tell you from experience money is number one at this business. A simple “ I’m sorry we messed up” could have avoided this review. I truly hope the owner and employees realize that theft at their benefit and piercing intoxicated people, no matter how old, are NOT victimless crimes. This town has several other clean, professional , trustworthy, and talented parlors with incredible artists and professional owners who actually care. Please go somewhere else.

name: Carlos Garcia
text: Carol was awesome.. The whole staff was great. Carol went over everything, gave her opinion for a great tattoo but also let me make any changes i wanted without trying to talk me into anything. The final decisions were left totally up to me. Good quality work for a great price. Would recomend this shop to anyone over any other shop on the gulf coast. Thank you carol and all of you at the empire tattoo. My wife and I will be back real soon for some more work.

name: Rachel Malena
text: Went on a Sunday. We called Saturday and asked if we could make an appointment. They said they had walk-ins only. We went up and they told us they could do simple 2x3 tattoos only.  They had 3 artists available, playing on their phones, and everything I tried to pick was too complicated..

name: Stephani Carl
text: A girlfriend and I were in Gulf Shores for a long girls weekend to de-stress and decided we wanted some fresh ink! The ladies at Empire were wonderful! They were able to fit us both in on an extremely busy Saturday! Maddie did a great job on my newest piece! I can’t wait until it’s all healed up!

name: Krystofer (KT) Thompson
text: Carol did an amazing job on the first portion of my sleeve work and I can’t wait to go back and get the other portions started. The ship is very bright and clean and every person on the staff is incredibly kind. The work that they do here is off the charts and I can’t recommend them enough.

name: Autumn Myers
text: Unfortunately I did not get to get tattooed by Empire they could not fit me into they’re schedule, so I went to a local shop. I was not provided any aftercare instructions at the other shop, I called Empire and they provided me with aftercare instructions and wrapped my tattoo for me, they were very generous and very helpful I appreciate the professionalism and they’re honesty ! Recommend coming here! The next time I’m in town this will be my one stop shop for my tattoos !

name: Matthew Hawkins
text:
I followed the Empire Tattoo Co. for 2-3 months before I booked an appointment. Everyone there is super nice and very professional. Carol
💥NAILED MY TATTOO💥 and the 6hrs in was there was the of the most comfortable session I’ve ever had. Couldn’t  recommend them enough and can’t wait for my next session. Blown away is an understatement and can’t wait to get back in the chair.

name: Ashley Smith
text: Great service, clean and professional Carol does great work nice and very professional.great tattoo work and piercings satisfied with both, will definitely get more work done by them and thanks again.

name: Cole Clanahan
text: Don't accept walk ins with tattoos bigger than 3x3 inches. But overall great clean atmosphere with some really good artists.

name: Jennifer Lowery
text: This place is awesome! The ladies that own and run it are AMAZING!!! I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS SHOP!!!!! Clean and beautiful inside and they were great with my 13 and 15 yr old daughters!!

name: Janelson Santos
text: I had a great experience for my first tattoo, I can’t wait to get more. Workers were really nice and welcoming. I would definitely recommend.

name: Terry Haas
text: Wonderful atmosphere and vibe! Everyone was very professional and the prices were Very reasonable. I will definitely be back in the future for my next tattoo!

name: Meagan Cauley
text: If I could leave more starts I would! I had a cluster of ideas for a tattoo I wanted. I had a consult with Carol and she pulled everything together. The tattoo is better than anything I could have imagined. She truly listens and puts her heart into her work. The studio is beautiful and so clean. Everyone that works there is so friendly and makes it an absolutely incredible experience! I had a long 4-5 hours session and it flew by. So thankful to have found such a talented artist and wonderful studio!

name: Austin Willingham
text: First, I wanna start by saying CAROL does an AMAZING job. The tattoos done by carol are some of the best quality you can kind ANYWHERE. I would recommend anyone to go get a tattoo at this shop by any of their artist. Carol & Polly worked to fit me in her schedule when she had an opening to give me the birthday best  birthday present. Not only do they do amazing ink work, they guide you on the design and how it will best work for you and your future. Also, they want the tattoo to look the best for your intentions. I am beyond happy with the piece I ended up getting. CAROL has an amazing touch and does amazing black ink & shading. Hands down overflowing with talent. You will not be let down!

name: Linda Ruiz
text: I feel so lucky to have found this place and to have Kelly West as the artist for my tattoo. It is literally beyond perfect and I am so in love with it! All staff was friendly and helpful, and Kelly was great to work with. I don’t think I could have found a better person to execute this piece as well as she did. The shop is clean, modern, and welcoming. I recommend 100% and look forward to returning for future ink!

name: Merrill Warren
text: Some of the best work out there. Great experience ever time I go. Carol is amazing! Highly recommend!

name: Tony Partain
text: The quality of my tattoo Is off the charts Not to mention  They were incredibly professional.. I would give them more than 5 stars if I could. Definitely will be going back and will be telling everyone where I got it.

name: Duda Menezes
text: Great vibes! Everybody is super friendly and professional. Awesome place to get a tattoo. I would definitely recommend.

name: Daniel Gates
text: Carol is amazing, she drew exactly what I was describing. Everyone in the shop is very friendly. Great prices and amazing work. 10 stars!!

name: Missy Millspaugh
text: CLEAN and PROFESSIONAL!!!  We were lucky to find Empire!  This isn’t your basic shop.  From the moment you enter the building you get an upscale experience.  The front desk staff is friendly and knowledgeable.  We had Kelly do our ink, can’t say enough great things about her.  She’s a great artist and up to date on new techniques and healing process of skin, and honest about placement of your ink choice.  We loved the fact the shop was easy to work with.

name: Maicon Kuster
text: Went to get a rememberance tattoo for my daddy. Carol is the best. Very talented and kind.  I would highly recommend her.  She has done 4 tattoos for me.

name: Cida Lima
text: Absolutely love this place and would never go anywhere else in the city for a piercing. Everyone there is friendly and gives great information and the shop is very clean.

name: Lucas Vinicius
text: I've a tattoo from this place and I'm sure I will continue to go here for many more. Every single artist does incredible work. You really get the quality you pay for here.

name: Kellie Davis
text: I had an amazing experience with empire tattoo, I went in for a cover up and had an idea but wasn’t  exactly sure how to lay it out. Carol made my dreams come true by covering something I hated with something that was absolutely beautiful. Very clean, professional place with great artist!

name: josiah decker
text: I’ve been tattooed by each of the artists here and they definitely know what they are doing. Very professional and easy to work with! Highly recommend! Great at what they do.

name: Alexia Burris
text: The workers were super fast and professional and explained the process super well!

name: Rebecca Sookdeo
text:
I walked in to get my nose pierced and was very happy with the result. Polly was nice enough to answer all of my questions before and after the piercing. She was patient, told me the after care options, and had a really nice dispostion. The establishment itself is clean and has a nice open space

If I get any ink work done, I will more than likely go back here

name: Kristy Hong
text: First time going to The Empire Tattoo and loved it! Their place is very nice with a modern type of feel. But most importantly, very clean! And I’m getting my tattoo done by Carol. Told her what I wanted and she was very understanding and helpful on the visual of what I wanted for my piece. And let me tell you, after she showed me my piece it looks amazing! First session went really well and I can’t wait for my second session to finish my piece!

name: Stephani Miller
text: Took my daughter to get her ears done, very patient and set aside extra time in case it was needed so we didn’t feel rushed.

name: Amanda Renfroe
text: This is the best place to get a tattoo! They are great ladies. Me and my daughter both went and got our tattoo and they look amazing. I want to thank Kelly for our tattoo she is amazing! If you want the best go to Empire in Foley Alabama. Thanks again

name: Karlie Reese
text: I got matching tattoos with my mom (done by Kelly) while we were on vacation and they were so professional! She paid very close attention to detail and did it perfectly! Plus everyone in the shop was friendly and didn’t try to rush you!

name: shanquivia lewis
text: carol is a Great artist the shop is beautiful everyone is well put together, Great people, very professional. I love it I would recommend every artist in the shop to anyone it’s a must see and you must get your ink done here. GO EMPIRE

name: Felipe Queiroz
text: I had my first tattoo done here and Carol was super patient, funny, kind and straight forward! Loved getting my tattoo here and can't wait to get another!

name: jennifer vargas
text: My daughter decided to get her nose pierced am Polly did a wonderful job and was patient with her.

name: Jill Mason
text: The whole experience was excellent. The studio is clean. Everyone is very nice. Carol is awesome. She did a fantastic job on my tattoo. I will definitely be back for another tattoo.

name: Katie Morris
text:
Only tattoo/piercing business I trust! Great experiences with every piercing and tattoo I’ve gotten! The shop has a great atmosphere!
Definitely coming back!

name: Sierra D
text: Maddie was super sweet and very detail oriented. I had a mix up with scheduling but they did everything in their power to get me in as soon as they could. The professionalism and attitude of the whole shop was amazing.

name: Molly Mihm
text: My best friend and I got matching tattoos and The Empire Tattoo did a fantastic job! They did such an amazing job that both of our moms ending up getting one too! Carol did all of ours! She did an amazing job! She had great attention to detail and gave us just what we wanted!!!! I enjoyed chatting with her in my session! I would recommend this shop to anyone and everyone!

name: Erin Pilkington
text: Carol did an amazing job on my tattoo. She was very easy to talk to and made the image I had in my mind come to life. I will definitely be back.

name: Getulio Cesar
text: Nice shop, and very clean, professional atmosphere.  Went in for my first piece there and the staff were really welcoming and friendly.

name: Charles Santucci
text: I wouldn't recommend this shop to anyone. They're not very professional at all, they have teenagers working the counter that have no knowledge about anything going on in the shop and don't answer the phone. They say they do piercings but couldn't do the piercing we wanted. I also overheard them dealing with another customer and they're not very accommodating.

resp.text:
Hi Charles, Sorry to read that you had a bad experience with us. Due the COVID-19 pandemic our shop started to follow some protocols to keep everyone save: as use of masks in our dependences, tattoos by appointments, and suspension of the service for some piercings on the mouth area and nose. Unfortunately we don’t do the piercing that you asked about (Vertical Labret and Ashley Piercing); the list of all the piercing that we offer is available on our website.  Again; we a very sorry about your experience at our shop.
We will take your review and work to improve our team a better customer service.
For any future concerns you can contact us at empiretattooadm@gmail.com

name: Annie Kozicki
text: OUTSTANDING! I met my artist Carol, a few months prior to my appointment at Empire. At the time she was working for a different company; when I decided I wanted my first tattoo I called that company and they told me she would be out for a while due to illness. I did a little more research only to find out that she opened Empire, her very own business! I made an appointment and they got me in for the very next day. From the moment I walked in the door they were very kind and helped me with my design. Carol and her staff were super amazing and made sure I was comfy before anything started. I LOVE Empire. Thank you all so much for making my first (and not last) experience perfect. Highly recommend.

name: Anna D
text: This is the first time I've visited Empire and I will definitely be back! I got a piercing from Polly and she is super thorough, which I very much appreciate. The facility is clean and very asthetically pleasing. Definitely recommend!

name: Ashleigh Williams
text: It is very clean and up kept. The employee's are very nice and talk with you through the process and explain the whole thing. I LOVE the place and highly recommend! I will go here from now on for the rest of my piercings.

name: Rosa Maria
text: They take walk-ins, prices are more than reasonable, artists are very kind and professional, and the work they do is fantastic.

name: Johnny
text: First time at the Empire Tattoo and it won’t be my last! Everyone was really nice and professional! Go check out their Instagram! All the artists do amazing work!

name: Katie Smith
text: AMAZING. I am absolutely in love with my tattoo. This was my first experience and the lady ,Mrs. Carol, was beyond my hopes and dreams. She was so patient and friendly. You can tell she loves what she does because it shows in how she interacts with you and in her work. They were nice enough to accept me and my friend as some pretty last minute walk-ins. The shop itself has an wonderful atmosphere. It was clean and comfortable. The music they played was great. 10/10 recommend to everyone and 10/10 will come back in the future.

name: Michael Egner
text: Customer Service was not friendly, daughters piercing was done roughly, post on ear piercing not nearly long enough, no after care instructions provided, no offering of after care products (which would be a great add on sale for them). Would not recommend

resp.text:
Hey Mr. Michael.
Sorry to read that you had a bad experience with us. We have a sheet with all the aftercare instructions for piercings and is our obligation to give one for everyone who gets this service with us. It was absolutely our fault if you weren’t provided with one. Please, feel free to contact us anytime by phone (251) 215-3784 or email theempiretattoocompany@gmail.com. We would really like to know more about your daughter's piercings so we can work to improve our team with a better customer service.

name: Suzana Silva
text: I can’t say enough great things about this place,  everyone was very professional and sweet, the shop is very clean and neat.

name: Kaylea
text: My family and I went there while we were on vacation, but I had no prior plans on getting a tattoo while we were on vacation. My dad showed me their Instagram page that was full of breathtaking tattoos and that’s when I decided to get one! Kelly was the one who actually did my tattoo and she most definitely made me feel very comfortable since it was my first tattoo and the tattoo itself turned out absolutely amazing! Next vacation, I do plan on going back to get another tattoo!

name: Alix Pineda
text: First able the place is unique, very clean and comfortable, Carol is very professional, she is very patience with her clients in the searching of the right tattoo, she knows the ultimate techniques,  i definitely  don't go to another place , love my mandala tattoo!!!! And looking forward for my next appointment

name: Sydney Failla
text: Got 2 tattoos done by Maddie! Everyone that works there was very friendly. Great quality work! One of the nicest tattoo shops I have ever been to!

name: Jade William
text: I got my belly button pierced and a second hole on both ears. I also took friends who got the same things done. Polly was very professional. She really took her time to align the hole before doing the piercing. The space is very clean and well thought out. I have viewed photos of their tattoo work and this is without a doubt where I will go for my next piece. I believe you will be impressed and just as happy as we all were if you go here.

name: Christy Blanton
text: Very clean. Everyone was very professional

name: Travis Youmans
text: Absolutely love the vibe at Empire! Everyone makes you feel like family! Kelly West is such a powerful and easy going artist! She'll hook you up with what you're craving. If it's out of her wheel house, she'll point you to an artist that does her tattoo's. Definitely going back soon!

name: Wendi Bowers
text: Carol is soft handed and quick!! Not bad priced either!!

name: Maddie Hollon
text: The best experience getting a tattoo! Called and they fit me and my friend in with no problem! They were so intentional on making sure we were getting exactly what we wanted. The environment was clean and updated. We loved it and will definitely go back the next time we visit! Also, Kelly did ours and she was amazing!! Highly recommend!!

name: Eullinde Nalindilien
text:
Got my first tattoo a week ago, and I love it! Maddie is very talented, and was was great to work with. I highly recommend her!
The whole experience I had at Empire was wonderful, especially for a tattoo newbie.

name: Tanner Wilson
text: This place is absolutely gorgeous, I walked in and instantly felt welcomed. Most important it was SO CLEAN! The staff is great, and will Work with you until you are happy with the design. My friend got a piercing and it was so quick Polly was awesome!  My artist was Maddie, and she was so sweet! She gave me the best tattoo I have!! I highly recommend this place. Thanks Empire!!!!

name: Eve Myers
text: Literally the best tattoo. The vibe of this place is amazing. 10/10 would go back. My artist was super laid back and patient when it came to the tattooing. No surprises, and designed it exactly how I wanted it. My favorite tattoo so far!!! The owner is so cool and chill and was so welcoming. If you want a great tattoo experience, DEFINITELY go here :)

name: eduarda lima
text: Staff is very professional and friendly, I’m in love with the aesthetics there, I will definitely be back!!

name: Loryn Brown
text: I got my first tattoo done here and my experience couldn’t have been any better! The whole staff was very nice and my tattoo artist Kelly did an amazing job and was constantly checking on me and making sure i was comfortable! The tattoo came out perfect! I would definitely recommend getting a tattoo here!

name: Sydney Reim
text: Such an incredible shop!! Super clean, great designs, and stellar work! 10 outta 10 would highly recommend. Looking forward to getting many more pieces here!

name: Brandon Sylvester
text: My name is Brandon Sylvester.  Carol just finished my sleeve.  She is extremely talented and I really enjoyed my time there.  Everyone was really down to earth and cool to talk too.  I will definitely be back and highly recommend this place to anyone wanting work done. Thank you.

name: Elliott Shirley
text: Love every piece that i have gotten from them! fantastic quality and overall a good atmosphere to be in!

name: Edward Gilomen
text: We made an appointment Sunday morning for later that same day. Texting in our design shortened our waiting and they were ready when we arrived. Great facility! Very clean and sanitized! Kelly did an amazing job! She's very professional, friendly and artistic. Thank you for a great session!

name: Emma Rosa
text: I've always had a great experience at the Empire Tattoo! The artists and staff are friendly and patient.

name: Victoria Rigsby
text:
I absolutely LOVE empire. I have been looking for the perfect tattoo shop for a long time, and I finally found it!! Kelly is amazing and so patient! I got two tattoos in one day and loved the vibe so much that I drove three hours to come back the next weekend for two more.
I can’t wait to go back for more 🤩🤩🤩

name: Joga na MMinha / Mario Masccaro
text: I can start by saying that the reception was excellent. Everyone was always attentive and clear in their opinions .. It was a really fantastic experience. The mood is different from all other shops. I loved the job and will be back again.  After all who gets a tattoo, does two, three ... ☺️👏🏻

name: J Heath
text: My sister was visiting from out of town and we wanted to get a piece to honor our mom. We already have a memorial piece and needed the new art work to match the size and location on the opposite arm. Kelly did an amazing job doing all that and more. When you find a shop & artist who you connect with, you stay. Already saving to book my next appointment.

name: Madison Failla
text: got 2 tattoos done by maddie and i love them!! everyone that works there are all very nice!

name: Blaine Keeling
text: The environment here was so relaxed and awesome. You can tell they all genuinely love what they do and they have a good time doing it with each other. I went into The Empire with a tattoo idea I thought was solid, they took the idea and made it 100X’s better. I know where I’m heading for my next tattoos!

name: Angela Long
text: My husband, and I, live in North Mobile. We drive an hour and a half to get our tats done by Carol. She’s the best around. And so kind.

name: Monica Vargas
text: I loved everything about this place. I’ve been in multiple shops all over the country and I can say this is by far my favorite. Not just because of the clean and professional atmosphere but the artists are friendly and personable and they’re the most talented in the county. I will be back for the rest of my work.

name: Katie Alder
text: This was not my first tattoo experience but it was by far my best! Maddie was professional and had a very light hand. Her work is beautiful. It was my daughter’s first tattoo and she was very nervous. The shop along with the attitude of the staff put her at ease and helped her feel comfortable!  I absolutely would recommend Empire Tattoo across the board.

name: Cara Ledford
text: It was a spur of the moment idea to get a tattoo while we were on vacation in the Gulf Shores area,  and my boyfriend did the research and found the best reviewed shop around for my first experience which happened to be Empire ! The artists and people greeted us as we came in and worked with us instantly ! Maddie , the artist who did our matching tattoos was really sweet and really catered to me as I was really nervous about getting a tattoo for my first time which really makes a big difference for me and makes a really good impression ! She made sure it was everything we wanted and more , she made me feel so comfortable and made the whole experience a dream! Not to mention walking into Empire was like a breath of fresh air , it’s not overwhelming like you would normally see with other shops that cram you into a small room and with everything on the walls you can’t really focus ! It’s modern and an open setting where you can see the other artists working which really blew me away ! I can’t wait to come back to this shop when we’re down south again ! 10/10 would Highly Recommend!

name: Maria Taylor
text:
I’ve personally got tattoos from Maddie and Carol, and I could not be more satisfied with the service and quality of the work I got inked on my body. The shop is immaculate, the staff is fantastic and the artists are incredibly talented. I don’t know of a better shop in the general Foley - OB area.

Ten stars ⭐️

name: victoria s.
text: got my first tattoo here with carol and it turned out amazing. everyone is very talented and nice. the atmosphere is very comfortable. the shop is cool and clean. would absolutely recommend getting a tattoo or piercing here!

name: Adeline Crace
text: My experience here was absolutely fantastic, I’ve been there twice now. Once for a piercing and the second a beautiful tattoo!! I will definitely be going back. Everyone there is super nice! 10/10 would recommend!!

name: ezytoplez
text: Carol not only did my 1st body are but also did my 2nd body art at the same appointment.  All employees at The Empire Tattoo Company are friendly, knowledgeable, and professional and go beyond excellence in ensuring complete satisfaction for their clients. The inside was tastefully decorated. Safety precautions were in place and carried out throughout the business’ inside area.  Masks were provided as were sanitation stations for use before entering the clean and well sanitized area where the unfolding of my body art took place. Carol and Polly were most helpful in finalizing my body art designs. Carol is a highly expert body art artist. She is passionate about her work and in ensuring her clients are satisfied. She made certain that I was comfortable as she made my body art come to life. I am planning for my 3rd one sometime in July.  I highly recommend The Empire Tattoo Company to everyone whether you are wanting body art or piercings, or both. In my opinion The Empire Tattoo Company exceeds all expectations in making sure their clients are satisfied, which is their mission. Thank you The Empire Tattoo Company. I am a more than satisfied client. 💕

name: Felix Tankersley
text: Great experience. Have been to many shops and had many artist, this place is by far the most welcoming shop I’ve visited. Kelly was a fantastic artist who took a great deal and care In Delivering exactly what I was looking for. Highly recommend.

name: IAmDes
text: Best tattoo shop in foley, very professional, Carol does all my work and I’ll continue to be a client here. They are all amazing. I recommend everyone to go here. You won’t regret it.

name: Dhawk W
text: This business was very professional, and I had a great experience. They were very thorough, and made sure that they got the setting of the tattoo in the spot I wanted several times before starting. You can also tell that they have been doing it for a while because they do not try to hustle you with price. Other local places try to hike up the price because they think you are a tourist or it is the peak season, but not Empire. They gave me a fair price for what I wanted, and also made sure that they did any touch up work necessary. They are also very clean, and take their work and customers seriously by doing appointment only during COVID-19. This is a great new place in Foley, and I will be returning for future work.

name: Tim Bailey
text: Cleanest tattoo studio I’ve seen, the artist finished my wife’s tattoo and made it look magnificent. I would highly recommended anyone looking for ink in the surrounding areas to go there. I’m planning on going in fall to get some work done.

name: Andrea Dufour
text: Carol is 100% the best tattoo artist I’ve ever worked with. She is amazing and can create anything you imagine. The new shop is very comfortable and super clean!  You will never be disappointed with any work done here. 😁😎

name: Evan Greer
text: This tattoo was done so well that my others looked shabby. The artist, whose name I sadly forgot, took her time and it shows. I came in with a small group and I don’t think any of us left unhappy. 11/10

name: kayli blaylock
text: Super nice people. Very very clean shop. Amazing work done!! And super quick time. Highly recommend

name: laura martins
text: My friend and I got off work late and they were closed the next day, but Carol and Polly were nice enough too stay open later to get us in that night. The studio is professional and very clean, Carol is very knowledgeable about tattooing and did a great job. Carol and Polly are very passionate about what they do and it is definitely seen through their work, 10/10 recommend, will be going back!

name: Cau Cau
text:
I had my first tattoo done at this beautiful and positive vibe place. I loved! I felt confident and loved the way everything is so clean and nicely organized . Thank you guys !
Claudia E.

name: lari Sarana
text: It's such a cool and cozy place, with a very pleasant atmosphere. One of the best tatoo studios I have even seen.  Carol is a great artist and you can clearly see she puts her soul in her work!

name: Savannah Rogers
text: Came to the shop wanting to get my first tattoo. I was obviously very anxious and nervous, but the whole staff was very helpful and friendly throughout the entire process. Carol, the shop owner, actually did my tattoo and I couldn’t have asked for a better experience. She talked me through the entire thing and did an incredible job on my tattoo.The store had really good vibes and created an overall excellent experience. I’m so glad that I chose The Empire Tattoo Company for my first tattoo. They will always have my business, thanks for everything!

name: sarah pruett
text: Took my daughter to get her ears pierced. This shop is so clean, everyone so kind and professional. I would highly recommend!

name: Vicki Roberts
text: I love this place,great people who work there .very professional. I have told all my freinds to go here ,I will definitely go back for more tattoos .thank yall for a nice e clean shop

name: Ash xD
text: My friend and husband and myself got a tattoo here, we did enjoy our artist (Cant remember her name, sorry). Would recommend anyone for getting a tattoo. Possibly go back for a piercing, if i have time!

name: Danielle West
text: Out of all of my tattoos, the two I got from Empire are my absolute favorite! Kelly West was my artist and she did a tremendous job. The atmosphere of this place is so welcoming and I will definitely be back for more. Thank y’all so much!

name: Megan Masters

name: Jason Brown
text: The new shop is very clean and well maintained. All appropriate steps were taken for comfort and infection prevention. (Got this done while COVID precautions were implemented). The entire staff are friendly and happy to help make the tattoo experience as easy and comfortable as possible. Carol did a piece for me that carried a lot of meaning. She took care to make sure everything was as perfect as possible. This is not the get in, get out type of business. Time and care was taken to ensure my utmost satisfaction. I would definitely recommend this place. I will be using them as my local tattoo shop.

name: AUSTIN MARSH
text:
I was apprehensive about getting my first tattoo. But, last night when I walked into Studio 251, I was greeted with such kindness and was relieved to find such a clean and inviting facility. My fears were shot down immediately. Shawn listened to the concept I wanted, I showed him some pictures, and then he started on a design that I instantly fell in love with. From there on, he took things very slow for my sake, and created something that was stunning. His attention to detail and shading work really make this thing pop, and I couldn’t be happier.

A few other family members got their first tattoos last night as well, and we were all super impressed and put at ease by their friendliness. These guys aren’t your stereotypical tattoo artists, they’re such great people, so don’t be scared!

text: Being a client of Gulf Coast Ink for 2 years and going to Shawn SINCE he’s been at Symbolic and ~~only~~ Shawn, I believe that this shop is the best one in Foley.. HELL, in Baldwin County. Gulf Coast Ink Studio 251 is one of the cleanest, coolest places to get your tattoos done. Light hands, great art, and friendship. Anyone that speaks bad on them is crazy cus they are willing and ready to work with a large variety of people and artwork. (Shawn is known for his darker tattoos, and I have a full VERY colorful bunch of flowers that he has worked on for about a year now.) I am actually getting an add-on AS I TYPE THIS. So, yea, back to the review.  F I V E S T A R S to the staff at GCIS251, LOVE YOU GUYS 😍💕

resp.text: I’m so confused by this review. Mainly the flirting part. If how I treat the apprentice (who I can only assume you’re talking about) is flirting to you then you have a very strange and unrecognized outlook on flirting. Secondly when did I even tattoo you? Your name isn’t on my schedule and I have no recollection of ever tattooing you. Probably due to me being too busy flirting. And Lastly, well you’re right about time. I suck at estimating how long a tattoo will take or how long a drawing will take, but hey, aren’t tattoos and design supposed to take time. Idk maybe it’s just me but I prefer to take my time when it comes to permanent art.

Check them out if you get the chance, you wont be sorry.

name: Austin Holly
text: I actually had a very pleasant experience getting my tattoo. I had to change the placement but that was probably for the best. But other then that, it was nice. I was even thinking of setting up an appointment with Jay to get a large piece done on my leg. The tattoo came out great and my artist was Lane who is usually appointment only but he ended up seeing me and my fiance anyways as a walk in to help out. Though i have no complaints with my tattoo, I gave 3 stars because of a follow up conversation between Lane and my fiance. The night after we got our tattoos my fiance was growing more and more uncomfortable with the font on his tattoo. He loves his tattoo and thinks its beautiful work but he thought the font should be a little more rough and he wanted to try and think of a way to rough it up a little before going back to the parlor and seeing if Lane liked the idea. So he messaged night owl if they still had the stincel that they used for his tattoo. Instead of replying with a no or sending the picture, Lane seemed to have gotten personally offended by this and told my fiance to come to the parlor and face him like a man. This didn't sit well with me at all as my fiance was only trying to get help and he was treated disrespectfully. This is upsetting because my coworker has told me how kind and talented Lane is and me and my fiance were both excited to have him as our artist. Perhaps he was just having a bad night, but either way I am disappointed in the way he spoke to my fiance. I am thankful he went ahead and did pur tattoos even though he didn't have to but he went a bit far. We will probably not go back

name: Tyler Orr
text:
Jesse at night owl is one of the best artist I know. She was able to get me and my mother in before closing and get our tattoos done quickly at a very affordable price. Thank you so much for making this happen for us Jesse. I will defiantly be back.

Before and after posted as well.

name: Jody Gable
text: I called to see if they had time to do 2 tattoos and was told to come on. After waiting 2 hours I was told they was booked until August on cover ups and was going to charge me $230 to do a tiny out line of elephants after I just heard them give cheaper prices for bigger tattoos. I finally get a babysitter so I can get my tattoo and going home without it.

name: Jessica Bailey
text:
I got 3 of my tattoos at Night Owl. Adam has done 2/3 of my tattoos and I followed them through three shop transitions (two in Sumiton, and Jasper). My last visit there I was treated very poorly. I was told to wait, so I did. I got there well within the operating hours. I wanted to do a custom piece, which I am aware takes a little more time. I was understanding about them having other work lined up ahead of me. I was told to wait for service and that they would be with me within a 2 hour time frame. I waited the time just to be told they couldn't start even drafting because of it being close to closing time. It literally took under 10 minutes for Expert Ink to do a draft for me. I even got a better price. If I would have been told earlier that they had too much of a workload to do anything for me tonight that would have been acceptable. I would have tried to make an appointment to come back. I understand the artists and everyone have busy lives, but it is completely unprofessional to drive away a repeat customer ESPECIALLY after having them to wait for so long. I also overhead them talking smack about me in the back. I will NEVER go here again. I'm telling all my friends to conduct their business elsewhere also.

UPDATE: When I went to the studio,  Adam,  I was instructed that within a two hour time frame you would be available.  When that time frame was up,  you were working on another client.  I was told that even if I left and came back (so long as it was within the given timeframe, and it was) that I could hold my position in line.  I was ready, willing, and able to wait for you that night. It is the discourtesy in which I was treated that has left a sour taste in my mouth. I have no personal vendetta against you, because I wouldn't have been a repeat customer if I was dissatisfied with your work. You are a very skilled artist.  It is possible that this is a management issue.  You shouldn't advise clients that they will be seen within a certain timeframe and then proceed to take a walk-in over an appointment. It's also completely unacceptable that your apprentice was speaking disrespectfully about me,  especially within earshot.  I would have been willing to forgive the former if it hadn't been for the latter.  I was not getting irate with your staff.  I was agitated that I did as instructed and another person was taken in my place, but I would have still come back after that.  As I have stated,  I do understand how a business operates.  I was also upset that Cody wouldn't allow me the time to make up my mind without rushing me to leave. I was trying to figure out a time that I could possibly come back when your apprentice stepped out and proceeded to bad mouth me.  That is the sole reason I left and refuse to return.  You should work with staff that will not disrespect your repeat clients.

resp.text: Hi Jessica, thank you for your review. This is Adam and I will be the one leaving this reply. I hate that you feel like you were treated poorly, but I also understand that we cant make everyone happy. You did come in around 7:30pm and i had just started on a very large tattoo that would take a few hours. You and your companion Cody were informed by our apprentice who happens to resemble James Franco, that it would be a minimum of two hours before i would be able to stop and consult with you about the tattoo that you wished to get.  You and Cody both left and returned at a later time in which i was still working on the same client. I never rush a clients tattoo no matter what is waiting on me, my full focus is with whatever client i am working with. When you returned, you and your companion became very irate that i wasn't ready for you at that time. As i was finishing up with my client we could hear you both arguing with the apprentice. I finished up with my client and you were told that we could set you up an appointment for the following day, due to the fact that it was now after 10:30pm. That is when you both told us that you would be leaving to go to another shop. I could hear the agitation in your voice and before i could come out there to talk to you personally you had left. I do my best to treat everyone that comes through the doors with the most professional courtesy that I am able to give them. I understand that I am not the cheapest artist around , nor do I claim to be. I do however strive to be the best i can possibly be and treat all my clients with a certain sense of class and respect, even though at some time that same demeanor is not reciprocated. If you would like to come back to the shop and talk with me personally i would be more than happy to accommodate you.

Anyway lesson learned that you get what you pay for!!  Harry White was the best, most professional and friendly artist I have ever met,  he eased my mind and talked to me like we were friends and had known each other forever!  I was not just another in and out service, Harry educated me on how to properly take care of my piercing and told me to come back in if I needed anything altered. I feel like I just made a really great friend and built a long lasting relationship with him, I plan on going back to him for all of my tattoo and piercing services in the future! name: Becky Glenn
text: Art-I-Facts was clean, friendly, welcoming, & professional start-to-finish. My daughter & I went to have our noses pierced & the lady who does their piercings was GREAT! I wouldn’t let someone with whom I didn’t feel comfortable touch my daughter, but she made us feel immediately at ease & was very informative, patient & comforting (with me; my daughter didn’t require any of that - she was way braver than me!), & very skilled at executing “one swift motion” to pierce, secure, etc. I know she had a certain time window in which to work since there were others scheduled, but she did not make me feel rushed or pressed in any way (did I mention I was extremely apprehensive & had to “take a minute”). She sanitized the station between my daughter & myself, wore a mask the entire time, had separate trays of tools for each of us with clean, sanitized tools & all safety protocols were fully in place. I 100% recommend Art-I-Facts for body piercing (I assume their tattoo artists are equally as professional; there were a couple of tattoo customers & the artists & customers were engaged in pleasant conversation & everyone seemed upbeat & comfortable).

Update: 7 months later I made a return visit to see Q for a new Conch piercing. And once I again I left extremely satisfied and raving to my friends. She understands piercings aren't one size fits all, that healing times and pain threshold vary from client to client, and she discussed that we with me as planned out my next round of piercings. She is a true professional and I fully trust her.

--------
We had an AMAZING experience with Q at Artifacts. Actually the entire staff there was so welcoming and relaxed. It really set the vibe for us. We made an appointment, arrived early, and she was able to start ahead of schedule. She took her time explaining everything to my daughter and then made sure she understood the cleaning and care of her piercings. I was so pleased I went ahead and had her do my Tragus as well. name: Reddington Kaplan
text:
I was super excited about my tattoo with Josh. Seeing as Art-I-Facts has 5 stars and I’ve heard excellent reviews, I made an appointment about 5-6 weeks before getting it done. I sent ideas of what I was looking for and emailed back and forth with someone about information etc. I had to ask at least 3 times about the estimated cost of the tattoo “$100/hour but ultimately it’s up to the artist” was what I was told.

When I arrived/got checked in etc. it took over an hour for Josh to come up with a design, even though the information had supposedly already been relayed to him. When I was finally called back to his tattoo area, I asked for something to be changed because it wasn’t what I wanted and he said “no it can’t be done... it has the same meaning, right?” Well not to me but I wasn’t about to argue.

The tattoo is decent, but it’s very dark and you can hardly read the quote. I feel like I was placed with someone that the owners don’t really care about giving new clients to. I was charged for 2.5 hours of work and it wasn’t even 2 hours...

I feel the shop was unprofessional as a whole. Josh was always taking phone calls so it was very stop start. I wasn’t spoken to once from start to finish until the end when I was asked if I wanted to take a look in the mirror. I respectfully declined and said I wanted to pay.

I pay with card no matter which shop I go to but they really wanted cash or cash app which I didn’t have and that also seemed to be an issue. Leaving the shop was the best part of this experience.

resp.text:
Hello Reddington Kaplan. We would like the opportunity to resolve any issues you may have had at our establishment. However we cannot find any record of you being one of our customers.
We have searched our paperwork, emails and calendar and cannot find anywhere evidence that you are in fact a client of ours.
Please respond if you were in our shop so we can perhaps rectify any issues you experienced.
Thank you.

The close proximity of the shop and family environment coupled with the quality of work is outstanding and tremendous; Artifacts is always the first place I recommend for newcomers and tattoo aficionados alike.
My personal favorite (don’t tell anyone) is Soo. She’s amazing, her attention to detail is astute, and her body of work speaks for itself.
Personally, along my journey I’ve learned that when You find an artist/shop that you can build and create with, that leads to an exemplary outcome for your art piece and you get that at Artifacts!

text: I went here because they had 5 stars and seemed like nice people. Keep in mind, this was my first tattoo so I had many questions and concerns. After communicating with my artist artist on how I wanted a few things touched up once my tattoo healed, I was told they were not comfortable touching it up and we were no longer welcome in their shop because I had asked too many questions!!!???? 🤬 So now I have found a wonderful place to redo it for me. All they care about is rushing people in and out to make money. They care nothing about the customer. We even went there twice before they finally told us that we had to make an appointment. 🙄 DO NOT GO HERE!!!! RUDE AF!!

resp.text:
I’m sorry ma’am you had a bad experience. We provided you with an amazing tattoo, then subsequently you told us u wished for a touch up, which we gladly accepted.
However when u went on to send our artist 40 emails+ in 48 hrs u were bothering our staff and burdening them in their off time. We then politely declined working with u again. You were abusive to our staff and unwilling to accept our advice, and that behavior is unacceptable in any setting. We wish you the best in your future tattoo endeavors but they will not be here.

name: Amanda B
text:
Great for piercings, love the atmosphere of the shop, but wasn't comfortable going back after my sleeve consult.

My appointment got changed after I set it up, never heard anything back when I tried to contact them about it (call and email), and on the day of the consult, I had to wait an hour for the artist to show up. On top of that, I was quoted one price when I set up the appointment and another when I got there.

Their communication needs work, so if you're looking for a large piece you may be better off somewhere else. If you're looking for a great piercing experience though, definitely check them out.

resp.text:
Hey Amanda.
We looked at our correspondence with you, and from what we can see u thought you had an appt for a consult. You weren’t clear on the fact that we don’t have appts for consults. Only tattoos. You booked an entire day of the lead artists time, time that he could’ve dedicated to someone who wanted a tattoo that day, so u could have a consult. You weren’t clear that you wanted a consult only when you set your date up with the admin asst. We understand that you’re inexperienced to the process of a large tattoo and we are very sorry for the confusion and will strive to do better in the future of informing our new clients.

text: One of the worst piercing experiences of my life. I went here Thursday hoping to get two piercings and when the piercer arrived I had to wait for her to finish her food for the next hour. After that she lead me to the chair and proceeded to pierce my ear and while doing so, the needle was stuck in my EAR. Not only did I have to ask what was going on, two days later (today) I had to remove it because the stud was made of nikkle and created blisters over my entire ear. She rushed the entire process. So much I only got my right ear done thankfully. “Walk-ins accepted” is what is stated but I wouldn’t recommend this place to my worst enemy. I truly regret wasting my time here and wish I didn’t sign all of those papers because what was done here was down utterly  wrong.

name: Luke S.
text:
I got my first tattoo yesterday. The artist, Josh, was professional, patient, and did excellent art work. When he first started, I began to feel sick because my blood sugar was dropping. He noticed, stopped immediately, and gave me a piece of candy to bring it back up and some water to keep me hydrated. I felt much better afterwards and had no problems after that.

I also noticed his attention to sterilization and cleanliness. With any tattoo shop, that's the number one concern. He coached me on keeping my tattoo clean and what to do as far as aftercare. I was also given a sheet with directions on aftercare before I left.

I would definitely recommend this place to anyone thinking about getting a tattoo or piercing.

resp.text: Hello Jennifer, we are sorry that you weren't happy with your experience. Can you elaborate on what went wrong and which piercer served you? As always we stand by our work and aim to provide the best customer experience possible. I will look deeper into this matter and am willing to offer you a free piercing of your choice done by our owner to be sure it is done right.

text:
I spotted someone in town with crazy amazing artwork, was referred and decided to check the shop out. I've been to countless shops across the country; Vegas, CA, NY, NJ, DC... this was by far the best experience from the door. Really welcoming environment/vibe from the owner, even at 8pm on a Saturday. I walked in, said what I wanted, filled out the paperwork, sat in the chair and was done within a few seconds. I spent more time making small talk after. The artist was extremely professional, insightful, and attentive.

I would recommend the shop to anyone, especially nervous first timers. Not to mention that the piercing and aftercare were extremely affordable, this place set the bar high.

name: Tyler Mauldin
text: I usually rate things based off of several criterion, service, quality, polish, etc. Three friends and I came during the friday the 13th special, so I can definitely understand if there were some kind of delay due to the event. we came in to leave our information around 4:15-4:30, and were told that it would probably take two hours to be ready, but that they would call us when they were ready for us. I got the call at 5:20 that they would be ready for me in 20 minutes. Cut to 11:15 and I've not gotten the tattoo yet. I  asked very politely around 9:30 if we could have possible been overlooked, and in return I recieved a short no. afterwards they seemed a bit paniced, reassuring me several times that there was just one more person ahead of me. That was a lie; at least 6 other people went before me. Dishonesty, and lack of respect for the customer is all that I've gotten out of this experience. I ended being second to last with my friend being last even though we came in early. I'll never return to this place. I wont say that their tattoos are bad because they arent. 5 stars for skill, if its worth the wait.

resp.text:
Tyler we told you when you came shortly after 520 that we mistakenly called u back. You were 41st in line at the point of your application being submitted. When u came back at 520 you even said ‘yeah I figured it was a mistake.’
On 20$ tattoo day, regrettably you should come when we open not at 4pm expecting to be served right away. Our staff was stretched thin and each and every client wanted their discounted 20$ tattoo right away.
We apologize for your inconvenience but when it’s nearly free, expect a long line these days.
Come back sometime and let us make it up to you.

name: Jessica D.
text: My friend and I got our ears pierced here, I got my nose pierced here, and I will never go to any other parlor to get something pierced! Megan, the lady who pierced both of us was extremely kind, funny, and welcoming. She did a phenomenal job and was very sweet the entire time. The prices for piercings are lower than at other parlors in this area, but the quality is just as good if not better. Anytime I come here, it’s a positive experience. The pulse has definitely made a lifetime customer out of my friend and I; I will recommend this parlor to everyone!

name: Minako Zoruichi
text: I am deeply grateful for the art they did at my request. The female tatoo artist has my deepest gratitude and respect.

name: Keith Vinson
text: We like to shop local and support small businesses in our county so I took my 3 1/2 year old daughter in there to get her ears pierced and they refused because she couldn’t sign her name on a consent form. Come on she’s 3 1/2 we have only worked on tracing her ABC’s not signing her full name. To me it looked like a place that only welcomes you if you have hard core tattoos and does not welcome a family that is trying to get their daughter’s ears pierced. We are her parents we sign consent forms every where else. Looks like we’re going to Madison they will be more than happy to take our money.

name: Bj Crookshank
text: Observed a nose piercing for anti-septic techniques.  Very professional with great after care instructions. (I am an RN & impressed with their technique.)

text: Easy environment. No pressure. Friendly crew. Seen people come out with hood looking tats. My wife and I both used Kevin. He was good, fast, and pretty light handed. We are very satisfied. You dont go into this place and they're playing loud music, and rowdy. Its actually a good place that you could carry your child with you if need.

name: Megan Lee
text:
Let me start with the place was clean and had a nice vibe. I contacted them through Facebook looking to set an appointment for two scoop tongue piercings. I sent them a picture of what I wanted and I was told they could do it. I had to pay a 20 dollar deposit to book my appointment and pay the remainder when I got to the shop. First, I had to pay the remainder before even receiving my service which I can understand but that wasn't on their website, Facebook page or anything. Secondly, when I went back to get my piercing, the lady pulled out the wrong kind of bar. I stated,"that's too small. That's not what I want." I pulled my phone out to show her the pic I sent and she told me" yea we don't have that bar for that piercing." She was very like nonchalant. We kept trying to make small talk and ask
Questions and she just seemed annoyed like she didn't wanna deal with us.  So I became upset, because whoever I was talking to on the Facebook page said y'all could do that piercing. Never said y'all didn't have the materials to do so. So she proceeds to show my thicker bars but still not what I initially went there to get. I'm telling her like noo, this not what I wanted.  She asks if I want anything else because they don't do refunds. So I came and paid 70 dollars under the assumption I would get what I wanted, they didn't have it and I couldn't get a refund. MINUS ONE STAR.  So I tell her I'll wait while my sister gets hers done first because I was upset. She got ready to do my sisters. The dots she placed on my sisters tongue were symmetrical  and even, BUT once she pierced her tongue we both instantly noticed it was more so to the left, way left, then the center of her tongue. My sister said she was fine with it. Cool. So I got back in the chair to get mines. I wasn't about to waste 70 bucks. ALSO I FEEL A CUSTOMER SHOULD NOT PAY FOR A SERVICE BEFORE THEY GET IT DONE ! Seeing as how there are no refunds, which I was told after the fact, and then lied about being able to do what I wanted. Anyways, I get in the chair. She is drawing the dots on my tongue and had to mark my tongue like 3-4 times because then we're not even. When she finally gets it even and placed in the middle. Let me say the ink taste terrible! She proceeds to pierce and I can feel as soon as the needle went in and was not near the middle of my tongue. IMMEDIATELY I notice my Piercing is to the left of my tongue also. So I'm irritated all over again. I kept trying to show her how it wasn't in the middle and she says"it's just the way you holding your tongue." Lmao, this was horrible! So I continue to tell her it's not in the middle and she tells me we can take it out and redo it and I'm like fine. She then Says "well not right now I have other appointments coming."
Like NO you should finish with the appointment you already are in and I PAID ! So I leave and then I decided hell no. I'm getting this redone. I go back and she tells me to come back at 4. Two hours later. Cool.
I come back. Have to wait like 30 min. She finally calls be back to redo it. I'm showing her how it's NOT in the middle. The second time hurt like HELL because my tongue was already starting to swell from the first go round. She gets it in a much better position this time. It's closer to middle but VERY slanted. I said thanks and it looks MUCH better then before because it honestly does and I left. My sister wanted hers done over but she saw how painful mines was and neither of us should not have even had to go thru that. It should've been right the first time AND we should've got what we originally came for. So now my tongue is 2x swollen and sore because it had to go thru the trauma  twice ! Her hands were also shakey and normally when people pierce something like a tongue, they stand in front of you. Instead she was on the side which might have been the reason for them being sideways. Like I stated. The place was very clean and had a cool vibe. I just had a bad experience.

name: Amanda Whitlock
text: Tonight, I waited four hours for a four-line tattoo that I never received. If I could give zero stars, I would. I decided to come to Royal Spade after seeing a Facebook post about Friday the 13th tattoo specials. The Facebook post stated that they would be doing small 2-4 inch simple tattoo designs from 1-10pm and it specifically said Walk-In only. I arrived at the shop around 6:30pm and paid for my tattoo. At that point, there were five other people in the waiting area. As I waited, several other people came into the shop. I waited for a couple of hours as the people that came in before me got their tattoos done. At around 9:45, the receptionist called back people that arrived after I did. I was a little confused, so I went to the desk and asked the receptionist if I was next in line. She told me that there was one couple ahead of me but that I would be next after that. She asked what my tattoo was, and I told her it was the symbol for the air element, which was only a triangle with a line through it. She told me that she would try to squeeze me in next before the couple because my tattoo was so simple. At around 10:30, the couple that was ahead of me was called back. A few minutes later, another couple that arrived after me was called back. I went to the front desk and told the receptionist that I thought I was next. It was at this point that one of the tattoo artists came up and told me that they could not keep tattooing all night and that they could not accept walk-ins all night. I pointed out that people who arrived after me were called back, and that I had been there since 6:30pm. That is when he informed me that everyone that was called back had been in earlier that day and were told to come back later. I was dumbfounded that I was not told this once; not when I came in nor during the four-hour duration I spent waiting. I was not informed about any possibility that I would not be able to get my tattoo tonight until after I had been waiting four hours, and then was told that I could not get my tattoo. It also makes no sense to me why people could leave and come back for a special that was advertised as Walk-In only. I am extremely disappointed in the lack of organization and customer service of this shop and I would not wish this horrible experience on anyone.

resp.text: We already told you that we were sorry we cannot get to your tattoo, we were booked for the rest of the day. if you paid for your tattoo? you can come back for a refund tomorrow, but that's about it. we will not be able to help you with any other services in the future due to your lack of respect for us.

I will definitely be going back to have all my work done through Skin Deep because they have such amazingly talented artist there, and I have a few more piercings I’m getting which I will also have done there. name: Jay Johnson
text: the man that did my tattoos was very nice but the tattoos turned out HORRIBLY.. they just turned into open scabs and one of them formed a water bubble as if it were a burn. I went back to show them the tattoo and the first thing that was asked was “did you get it here” .... KNOWING that they had JUST seen me.!! Then I was directed to another artist there who DID NOT do my tattoos and wasn’t even there the day i had got them and he clearly knew that something wasn’t right because he asked “what have you put on it.?!?” And I replied “aquaphor” because that’s what they recommended and that’s also what I used for my other previous tattoos. And then he tried to get smart saying how long he’s been in “the chair” and they couldn’t do anything until it “healed” But the thing is when this heals they wouldn’t be able to put ink on the spots that are MISSING SKIN and they KNOW IT. I was extremely polite until they tried to pass it off like they didn’t see my skin and the colored FLESH that was showing because the artist dug wayyy too deep. I was even okay with the artist not making the tattoo the color i wanted because he claimed he “couldn’t see well” that night so i went with a whole nother tattoo look than i was going for.& I thought it still turned out nicely until things took a turn for the worst.  I know how tattoos are supposed to heal because I have them and have went to MULTIPLE ARTISTS so It’s not me being “picky” or rude . I at least wanted them to be more concerned but I couldn’t get an apology, an offer to make things right, or even my money back. But I have contacted my lawyer and I will have to make the necessary steps.!! Like I said the man who did the tatt was  NICE as ever but he dug too deep and it left permanent damage on both tats and it could’ve went differently had they at least acknowledged what was wrong. Truly sad the way things were handled/not handled.!! No one wants to have messed up skin especially in a place where it’s visible to people. I trusted them with my skin and the art but got done horribly.. this is why I believe with some places you need to just pay half or pay after the work is done and even if you pay before hand, if something goes wrong because of THEM and you go to them in a polite manner even though this is your body so you have a reason to be alarm and HEATED ....then they should at least do everything in their power to make it right and pay you back and try to fix it. But like I said there’s no fixing this and they knew it that’s why I had to take legal action. Not trying to bash their business or anything because my first initial thought was “they’re pretty nice people and it’s a cool space” when i first walked in to set the appointment but as far as my experience and things .... I definitely won’t be going there again and the way they handled my situation.. I highly wouldn’t recommend and that’s just me.!!
